verified_claims.claim: 84% of developers already use or plan to use AI coding tools
Replit Agent drove the company from $10M to $100M ARR in 9 months

Approximately 50% of LLM-generated code contains security vulnerabilities
41% higher code churn rate for AI-generated code
92% of developers now measure productivity by impact rather than output

Gartner predicts 40% of agentic AI projects will be canceled by 2027 due to unrealistic expectations
Kent Beck, creator of Extreme Programming, has been coding for 52 years and is re-energized by AI agents
